name: Collapsible.Root
description: An interactive component that can be expanded or collapsed.
description_zh: An interactive component that can be expanded or collapsed.

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 使用提供的子元素作为默认渲染元素，结合它们的 props 和行为。

defaultOpen.description:
The initial open state of the collapsible when it is first rendered.
Use when you do not need to control its open state.
defaultOpen.description_zh:
首次渲染可折叠对象时的初始打开状态。
在不需要控制其打开状态时使用。

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type: Partial<{ root: string; content: string; trigger: string }>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the collapsible. Useful for composition.
ids.description_zh: 可折叠对象中元素的 ID。对合成很有用。

open.description: The controlled open state of the collapsible. Can be binded with v-model.
open.description_zh: 可折叠物的受控打开状态。可以与 v-model 绑定。

events.name: exitComplete
events.description: Function called when the animation ends in the closed state.
events.description_zh: 动画以 closed 状态结束时调用的函数。

events.name: openChange
events.description: Function called when the popup is opened
events.description_zh: 打开弹出窗口时调用的函数

events.name: update:open
events.description: Event handler called when the open state of the collapsible changes.
events.description_zh: 当可折叠的 open 状态发生更改时调用的事件处理程序。
